title: MinIO stops distributing free Docker images
author: LexSiga
aiHeadline: MinIO decides that 'free' was just a marketing ploy all along, now charging for Docker images because apparently, open-source is a joke.

title: Internet's biggest annoyance: Cookie laws should target browsers, not websites
author: SweetSoftPillow
aiHeadline: The internet's biggest annoyance? Cookie laws should target browsers, not websites—because what we really need is another layer of bureaucracy.

title: Greg Newby, CEO of Project Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation, has died
author: ron_k
aiHeadline: Greg Newby, CEO of Project Gutenberg, has died, leaving the world without his invaluable contributions to free literature and a gaping hole in the digital library community—but at least his work will live on in our e-books, right?

title: Scripts I wrote that I use all the time
author: speckx
aiHeadline: Scripts I wrote that I use all the time—because apparently, I'm too lazy to do anything manually, and my computer is my personal assistant now.

title: Meta is axing 600 roles across its AI division
author: Lionga
aiHeadline: Meta is axing 600 roles across its AI division, proving that even AI can't save you from the corporate layoffs machine.
